products.title: Infusion Asc Magnolia Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc magnolia perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Hive Plain Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: Hiveplaincream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain cream perfect fit pleated blind px71002.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Calico Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Blackout Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout cream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Kalm Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit kalm wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Armathwait Russett Dove
products.description: Made to measure voyage armathwait russett dove soft roller blind. Dainty love birds sit amongst pretty climbing cherry blossom, a perfect addition to any modern country interior.
